item.title: CVE-2024-22149|2024-03-27T05:51:32.364Z -- Oliver Seidel, Bastian Germann -- CformsII
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Oliver Seidel, Bastian Germann CformsII allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CformsII: from n/a through 15.0.5.
